DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether resistance training aid smoking cessation .
DOC.brief_title: Resistance Training Aid Smoking Cessation Treatment
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old , smoke five cigarette day least past 12 month Participating type exercise > 60 minutes/week past 3 month , current smokeless tobacco use , participation ongoing effort quit smoking , current planned pregnancy , serious medical condition would make exercise unsafe
